info.description: API to create, update and manage the external user details for purposes of user administration
info.title: External User Administration

smsNumber.description: The mobile SMS number of the customer

documentName.description: Specifies the name of the document.

documentId.description: Based on documentCode, the field defaults the required document codes

holderName.description: Identifies the Name of the  joint, substantial or beneficial owner

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

street.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.
Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

postCode.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer.
Identifies the address postal code for the customer.

townCountry.description: The town and country associated with the address
The town and country associated with the address

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.
Identifies the country of the customer.

relation.description: Identifies the inter-relationship between customer with other customers

relationCode.description: Identifies the inter-relationship between Customer records and enables a link to be formed for the purpose of evaluating the overall Customer position

relatedCustomerId.description: Identifies the Customer id details of the Related Customer

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.
The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.

lastName.description: The last name of an individual customer

languageId.description: Represents the language code of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a customer

residenceId.description: The identifier of the country of residence of a customer

sectorId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the type of customer

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

externalUserStatus.description: External User Access status. Can be Active,  Inactive, Barred, Initiated

statusChangeReason.description: Customer status update with respective reasons

productLineId.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

termsAccepted.description: Defines whether the user has accepted the Terms and Conditions first displayed when the user logs in to the system for the very first time.

userType.description: The type of the user. Can be CORPORATE, INTERMEDIARY,PERSONAL

loginMethod.description: The type of login method e.g. password, PIN, OTP

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

endTime.description: The time the job was ended.

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides
